snippet: Kentucky forward Anthony Davis and Kansas center Jeff Withey are two of the country’s best shot-blockers, but both were also late-blooming prospects.
abstract: Kentucky forward Anthony Davis and Kansas center Jeff Withey are two of the country’s best shot-blockers, but both were also late-blooming prospects; are preparing to face each other in the NCAA men's basketball tournament championship game.
lead_paragraph: Kentucky forward Anthony Davis and Kansas center Jeff Withey are two of the country’s best shot-blockers, but both were also late-blooming prospects.

headline.seo: N.C.A.A. Tournament: Davis and Withey Offer No Easy Path to Rim
headline.main: No Easy Path to the Rim for Either Tourney Finalist
headline.print_headline: No Easy Path to the Rim for Either Finalist
